page.title: 08LEISURE
page.content: To explain our leisure time we would really have to start where we relax _ our entertainment. That means tele- vision, radio, vidios, newspapers and other reading materials, if we really want to be quiet there's the local library. From information received from the above media, we have realized that for all of us to lead a full healthy life, we have to have an active pass time.This varies on your age, at our school it means all sport activities, swimming, rugby, soccer, running, netball, hockey etc. You need equipment for some games like a ball. different sizes of balls are used. A big ball for netball and football and a smaller ball for tennis. Cricket is played with a wooden bat and a hard ball called a corgi.While adults seem to have taken up jogging with aerobics for women and some men enjoy rugby.
